autoexec:
wait 10;sc set town;wait 1;ll profile default wait 10;sc set town;wait 1;ll profile default
ll profile Feary_Dynamis;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Dynamis Profile Loaded
ll profile Feary_HNM;wait 7;input /echo Feary's HNM Profile Loaded ll profile Feary_HNM;wait 7;input /echo Feary's HNM Profile Loaded ll profile Feary_HNM;wait 7;input /echo Feary's HNM Profile Loaded
ll profile Feary_Sky;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Sky Profile Loaded ll profile Feary_Sky;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Sky Profile Loaded
ll profile Feary_Sea;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Sea Profile Loaded ll profile Feary_Sea;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Sea Profile Loaded ll profile Feary_Sea;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Sea Profile Loaded
ll profile Feary_Limbus;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Apolloyon Profile Loaded ll profile Feary_Limbus;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Temenos Profile Loaded
ll profile Feary_Nyzul;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Nyzul Profile Loaded
ll profile Feary_Salvage;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Salvage Profile Loaded
ll profile Feary_Einherjar;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Einherjar Profile Loaded
ll profile Feary_WalkofEchoes;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Walk of Echoes Profile Loaded
ll profile Feary_Abyssea;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Abyssea Profile Loaded
ll profile Feary_Provenance;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Provenance Profile Loaded
ll profile Feary_Legion;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Legion Profile Loaded
ll profile Feary_Meebles;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Meebles Profile Loaded ll profile Feary_Meebles;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Meebles Profile Loaded ll profile Feary_Meebles;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Meebles Profile Loaded
ll profile Feary_Delve;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Delve Profile Loaded
ll profile Feary_Skirmish;wait 7;input /echo Feary's Skirmish Profile Loaded
sc var set NightOrDay Day sc var set NightOrDay Night input /echo Piercing Time input /echo Blunt Time input /echo Slashing Time
input /p ===== Formless Strikes On ====== input /p ===== Formless Strikes Off ====== wait 1;input /p ===== Mantra On ===== wait 1;input /p ===== Mantra Off ===== wait 1;input /p ===== Inner Strength On ===== wait 1;input /p ===== Inner Strength Off =====
sc set evasion;wait 1;input /equip feet "Pillager's Poulaines" sc set tp sc set tp;wait 1;input /equip sub $SubDagger sc set tp;wait 1;input /equip sub $SubDagger-->
wait 15;input /p ===== Nightingale @ 45 =====;wait 15;input /p ==== Nightingale @ 30 ====;wait 15;input /p ==== Nightingale @ 15 ====;wait 10;input /p ==== Nightingale @ 5 === wait 15;input /p ===== Troubadour @ 45 =====;wait 15;input /p ==== Troubadour @ 30 ====;wait 15;input /p ==== Troubadour @ 15 ====;wait 10;input /p ==== Troubadour @ 5 === input /p ==== Nightingale wore Off. input /p ==== Troubadour wore Off.
wait 1;input /equip feet "Herald's Gaiters"
input /p Charmed. input /p Uncharmed. input /p my brew is on. input /p my brew is off. input /p Doomed input /p No longer Doomed wait 1;sc set tp;wait 1;sc set weapon;wait 1;sc set weapon
autoexec register no_ammo input /echo no ammo
sc var set Stormelement Fire sc var set Stormelement None sc var set Stormelement Ice sc var set Stormelement None sc var set Stormelement Wind sc var set Stormelement None sc var set Stormelement Earth sc var set Stormelement None sc var set Stormelement Thunder sc var set Stormelement None sc var set Stormelement Water sc var set Stormelement None sc var set Stormelement Light sc var set Stormelement None sc var set Stormelement Dark sc var set Stormelement None
